msg: Minor tweak to the tx entry code to prevent an unnecessary wait when no Tx is actually in play.

author: rbowen
msg: via Matthew Sporleder - domain is required in the CO flag or cookies

author: rbowen
msg: The domain is not in fact optional. The cookie is not set if you don't

author: rbowen
msg: Whether it's intentional or not, the hostname/domainname argument to the
RewriteRule CO flag is in fact required. Cookies are not set without it.
